cab.content: J. 7 564-Thi3Document i-^Property^cfi ill)Britann;Ma;o3':yG^vGr.i;TiO:i43355) From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department2bth June 19J.9.Priority A. Clear the line.Foreign Secret. My telegram dated 19tli June. Afghanistan. When may I expect your proposals as to peace terms ? His Majesty's Government require time for full consideration. It is essential that terms should be ready on arrival of Afghan delegates and that latter should not be allowed to put forward proposals of their own.207
